thread.title: CTV Celebrates Television's Biggest Night With the 67TH EMMY速 AWARDS, Airing This Sunday, September 20
thread.title_full: CTV Celebrates Television's Biggest Night With the 67TH EMMY速 AWARDS, Airing This Sunday, September 20

title: CTV Celebrates Television's Biggest Night With the 67TH EMMY速 AWARDS, Airing This Sunday, September 20
text:
CTV Celebrates Television's Biggest Night With the 67TH EMMY速 AWARDS, Airing This Sunday, September 20 September 17, 2015 -- E! delivers can't-miss star-studded moments with COUNTDOWN TO THE RED CARPET and LIVE FROM THE RED CARPET ( Sept. 20 ); plus, FASHION POLICE: THE 2015 PRIMETIME EMMY AWARDS ( Sept. 21 ) critiques Emmy fashion hits and misses ETALK delivers exclusive and unparalleled pre and post-award show coverage to Canadians with access to the hottest parties and A-list interviews from the EMMY red carpet in Hollywood , Sept. 18 and 21 on CTV Jaimie Alexander , James Corden , Rob Lowe , Liev Schreiber , Amy Poehler , Jimmy Kimmel , Maggie Gyllenhaal , and more announced as presenters CTV.ca/Emmys home to EMMY content including video highlights posted throughout live broadcast 
To tweet this release: http://bmpr.ca/1iSnCEt 
TORONTO , Sept. 17, 2015 /CNW/ - Television's biggest night returns as the 67 th EMMY AWARDS airs live across the country this Sunday, Sept. 20 at 8 p.m. ET / 5 p.m. PT exclusively on CTV and CTV GO (visit CTV.ca to confirm local broadcast times). Hosted by EMMY Award-winning actor and comedian Andy Samberg , live from the Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles , the award ceremony honours the best in primetime television programming. From pre-award show hype including winner predictions and more EMMY-buzz on ETALK this week, to all the red carpet fashions leading into the broadcast, EMMY recaps, and post-EMMY bashes, E! and ETALK bring Canadians extensive, multi-platform coverage of television's most highly anticipated night. 
Entertainers confirmed to present at the 67 th EMMY AWARDS telecast include: Jaimie Alexander from CTV's BLINDSPOT, James Corden (THE LATE LATE SHOW), Jimmy Kimmel (JIMMY KIMMEL LIVE!), and Liev Schreiber ( RAY DONOVAN ), as well as EMMY-nominated stars Amy Poehler , Jamie Lee Curtis , Anthony Anderson , Will Forte , Maggie Gyllenhaal , LL Cool J, and more. The 67th EMMY AWARDS is produced by Don Mischer Productions. 
**Media Note** Photography for the 67 TH EMMY AWARDS is available online at BellMediaPR.ca . 
Fans can engage with the 67th EMMY AWARDS in a number of ways: 
Online Viewers can prepare for television's most-anticipated night by visiting CTV.ca/Emmys the online destination for the latest news about the 67 TH EMMY AWARDS . Featuring a complete list of nominees and ETALK interviews with some of this year's nominated stars, the site will also be home to video highlights from the show post-broadcast, as well as house the complete winners list. The full award show will also be available online the day after its television broadcast on CTV. 
Red Carpet Before the 67 TH EMMY AWARDS begins on Sunday( Sept. 20 ), veteran E! Hosts Ryan Seacrest and Giuliana Rancic welcome the biggest names in Hollywood on the EMMY red carpet, delivering one-on-one interviews and a first look at all the trendsetting fashion in two exclusive specials airing on E!: The ultimate destination for red carpet coverage, first up is E!'s COUNTDOWN TO THE RED CARPET ( 4:30 p.m. ET ) hosted by Giuliana Rancic and Brad Goreski , with celebrity correspondent Olivia Culpo , and fashion maven Zanna Roberts Rassi providing viewers all the scoop they need to know about television's biggest night of the year. From the nominees, to the biggest snubs of the year, likely winners, expected fashion, and more, E! gets viewers prepped for the big event. The countdown is followed by E!'s LIVE FROM THE RED CARPET ( 6 p.m. ET ) special, which provides viewers a front-row seat, as the hottest stars in film and television walk the EMMY red carpet, and chat with hosts Ryan Seacrest and Giuliana Rancic . Additionally, Ross Mathews and Christina Milian comment on all of the action from the E! Skybox, giving viewers an exclusive bird's-eye view of all the fashion. 
Post-Awards Coverage on Monday, Sept. 21 CTV's CANADA AM ( 7:40 a.m. ET ) delivers an EMMY's recap, featuring award show highlights from ETALK in Los Angeles . CP24 BREAKFAST ( 5 9 a.m. ET ) revisits must-see moments and EMMY highlights all morning long, including a live ETALK recap from Los Angeles ( 7:20 a.m. ET ). Host Marilyn Denis alongside ETALK Reporter Liz Trinnear and Fashion Stylist Peter Papapetrou dissect EMMY red carpet fashions on CTV's THE MARILYN DENIS SHOW ( 10 a.m. ET ). CTV's THE SOCIAL ( 1 p.m. ET ) features an extended conversation about the 67th Emmy Awards , with the co-hosts dishing the dirt on their personal hits and misses from the red carpet, and the standout moments from the evening. CTV's ETALK ( 7 p.m. ET /PT) recaps EMMY night, featuring must-see moments and exclusive one-on-one interviews from the 67th EMMY AWARDS red carpet outside the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles . Canada's #1 entertainment show also delivers star-studded arrivals and reactions from the night at the HBO after-party. Post-EMMY coverage continues on E! as well, as co-hosts Melissa Rivers , Giuliana Rancic , and Brad Goreski bring viewers hilarious and honest critiques of the best, brave, and down-right bogus fashion choices of the night in E!'s EMMY edition of FASHION POLICE ( 9 p.m. ET ).
